#Hadoop components

= Introduction =

soafaces comes packages with two components that allow for Hadoop integration:

 * Hadoop Job Manager
 * Hadoop Reporter


= Hadoop Job Manager =

This soafaces component lets you build, run and track any existing Hadoop job you have. You can simply package your hadoop code into a jar (or set of jars) and drop into the SFBs lib directory within.

== Tasklet ==
This SFB has a Tasklet that executes and tracks the Hadoop job on the server side.

== Weblet ==
This component comes with a Weblet customizer to let you customize how to connect and setup your Hadoop job.

== RuntimeViewer ==
This component includes a RuntimeViewer for tracking and monitoring the Hadoop job as it runs and to report on its final status.

= Hadoop Reporter =

This is a soafaces component (SFB) that runs a simple a job that will generate a report that can be viewed or emailed detailed the high-level status of all jobs within your specified Hadoop environment.
